data.title: Former Executive Board Members
data.text:
With gratitude for their leadership, counsel, and support, we thank our former Executive Board members, who helped enhance and expand Wharton’s impact as the foremost teaching, research, and experience-led business school in the world.

Alison Matejczyk

Interim Chief Advancement Officer, Wharton External Affairs

The Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania
